short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Notion Cover to generator a cover for Notion note cover or the others cover.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# Features

- Unlimited generation and download.
- Custom background image.
- Multiple fonts to choose from, custom font colors, custom font styles and sizes.
- Title and subtitle position customization.
- Export the synthesized image in “png/jpeg/webp” format to the local.

# How to use?

- Click on the Chrome extension app.
- Click ‘Begin to Make Your Notion Cover’ Button, open the ‘Make Your Notion Cover’ page.
- Select the background image, fill in the title and subheadings, and set relevant parameters.
- Click ‘Generate and Download’ button to download image.

# **Is it Free?**

Indeed, Notion Cover is available for free. You can access the basic features and choose to upgrade for more functionalities.

# **Data Privacy**

All data processing occurs locally on your computer, and it never traverses our servers.

# **Disclaimer**

Notion is a trademark owned by Notion Inc. Notion Cover has no affiliation, endorsement, sponsorship, or direct relation to Notion, Inc., its affiliates, or subsidiaries.
